snippet: Rafael Nadal lost to Fernando Verdasco in the third round of the Madrid Open on Thursday, then hinted he might skip the event next year because of the unusual surface.
abstract: Fernando Verdasco defeats Rafael Nadal in third round of Madrid Open tennis tournament; other results noted.
lead_paragraph: Rafael Nadal lost to Fernando Verdasco in the third round of the Madrid Open on Thursday, then hinted he might skip the event next year because of the unusual surface.

headline.seo: Nadal Loses on Madrid’s Blue Clay After Complaining About It
headline.main: Nadal Loses on Madrid’s Blue Clay After Complaining About It
headline.print_headline: Nadal, No Fan of Blue Clay, Loses on It
